Articles.Content: Jeb is throwing a booster away! You should try and stop him!
You chase him to floor 96...it\'s empty.....
Then go up to floor 97, void of ideas of what to do.
You go to floor 98, and you find love. (what is love! Baby dont hurt me dont hurt me no more)
You get hurt, and run to floor 99.
YOU FIND FLOOR 100! Its a celebration of climbing over 100 flights of steps. You take a bottle of the strongest, cheapest drink and move on.

...You move on down to floor 99 again, and find something you didn\'t see before...

But what is it?
Its nothing, but its everything at the same time. You go back up to floor 100. You find the after-party.
You get scared and go back to floor 99 and find The Messiah!
You go to 100 again.
you go to 99 again. Finding a trophy (says, winner for most floors stalled at)
You go down to 98, and find a pie!
you go to 99 and find a thretening note (hint hint)

Not jsut any pie, PINKIE PIE, so you have a party

You go back to 99, and find rarity making a dress for you

NINJAED NOOOO

Not jsut any pie, PINKIE PIE, so you have a party

You go back to 99, and find rarity making a dress for you

NINJAED NOOOO

FIx your post. Nao
You teleport to floor 98 again. Fun!

You teleport to floor 98 again. Fun!

You go back to 99. Nothing exciting.

You go to level 100...

You pray that this game ends.

You go to level 101. You find a mysterious door named Vault 101.

You wonder what happens if you pull that lever.

A: Lever

B: Go to next level
You go to level 102 and you find a portal to equestria.

Upon losing your weapon to a zombie\'s unfeeling grip, you are forced to retreat up to level 94, where there is a collection of every villain in every video game and movie there ever was in one huge room (which somehow doesn\'t cause the skyscraper to become at all larger on this level than any other, at least on the outside).

Upon losing your weapon to a zombie\'s unfeeling grip, you are forced to retreat up to level 94, where there is a collection of every villain in every video game and movie there ever was in one huge room (which somehow doesn\'t cause the skyscraper to become at all larger on this level than any other, at least on the outside).

*SIGH*

Why do people not understand \'only go up/don ONE LEVEL at a time?

*MINCESPY FACEHOOFS*

You go to 103 and find a wormhole.
you go up to 104 and find several clones of one person called gary.
You go up to 105 and find sparta.
Sparta kicks a Persian off the building, into a pothole - and you run away due to being scared up to floor 106.
